ValidationRule.description: Only certain User.Roles are allowed to update certain Icon Type picklist values.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Icon_Type__c), ( (ISPICKVAL(Icon_Type__c, 'Reseller - Brick and Mortar')) || (ISPICKVAL(Icon_Type__c, 'Reseller - Online')) || (ISPICKVAL(Icon_Type__c, 'Reseller - Partner')) || (ISPICKVAL(Icon_Type__c, 'Reseller - New Dealer')) ), ($UserRole.Name <> "Icon Service Manager"), ($UserRole.Name <> "Icon General Manager"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your User Role will not allow you to update this Icon Type picklist value.
